QuestData.Title: Let the Residue Lead You
QuestData.Description:
I have fashioned a device that will emit bioluminescent light when toggled on, allowing you to see any Azerite residue that lingers.
It should give you a clear trail to the weapons cache.
Good luck, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the residue trail to locate the Azerite Weapons Cache.
